document_data.name: Rod of Rending
document_data.mainbody: A '''''rod of rending''''' was an enchanted rod favored by servants of the [[Zakharan pantheon|Savage God]] [[Ragarra]] in [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Description: These rods were typically made from ebony and had a [[crocodile]]'s claw attached to one end.
document_data.Powers: As with the ''[[rending]]'' spell used by cultists of Ragarra, this rod was used to destroy personal property, including both livestock and slaves. Up to 8 cubic feet of matter could be destroyed at a time with this item. The magic had no effect if used on a free citizen or a wild creature.
